title: Lunar Portal Staff
info: The Lunar Portal Staff is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord sentry summon weapon that summons a floating "portal". The player cannot interact with it; it instead fires a continuous beam at enemies within its 60-tile range. The Lunar Portal Staff is a sentry-style minion, similar to the Frost Hydra, only lasting two minutes, remaining stationary, and not counting against the player's minion capacity. The Lunar Portal Staff has a 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) chance of being dropped by the Moon Lord boss.
